texts.content: You can fool all of the people some of the time, and some of the people all of the time, but you can't fool all of the people all of the time. -Abraham Lincoln

items.title: Frontend Developer
items.description: I have made some web view using Nuxt JS and React JS. Also using HTML, CSS and JavaScript is a must.

items.title: Backend Developer
items.description: To catch, calculate and serve some data from user, i often use Golang, Express JS and Django framework and PostgreSQL to store the data.

items.title: DevOps Engineer
items.description: Often use NGINX and Docker to make a website accessible to many people. Sometimes use Google Cloud to deploy a web service such as App Engine.

texts.content: This website is an backoffice system for lecturer in Physics Department, Padjadjaran University. It helps head of physics department to assess lecturers about the activeness of uploading journals to Scopus.
Tech Stack: Python Django (Backend) and HTML, CSS and JS (Frontend)

This web application is useful to calculate some distance, area or measure of some landfill and 3D building asset. Took Bing Maps as a basemap, this web application acts like a map in general with some special features in processing its spatial data.
Tech Stack: React JS (Frontend) and Express JS (Backend)
This web application is useful some data from microcontroller that given by sensors and actuator. User can analyze all the sensors data, and do some act to trigger the actuator using this website.
Tech Stack: Nuxt JS (Frontend), Golang (Backend), Apache Kafka (Broker)
This web application is useful for user that want to get a measure for some instrument. As an example, if we have Instrument A, it will have some parameter such as pH, waste water, etc.
